title: WHEEL HUB FOR AN AXLE OF A VEHICLE COMPRISING AN IMPROVED INTEGRATED REDUCTION SYSTEM
fig_desc: figure 8 shows a partially sectional view of an axle comprising a wheel hub according to the embodiments of figures 1 to 6
all_fig_descs: figure 8 shows a partially sectional view of an axle comprising a wheel hub according to the embodiments of figures 1 to 6

The actuator means 13 described above further comprise valve means 31, which are configured to selectively introduce compressed air into the portion 29b of the radial seat 29 or to allow it to flow out, as shown in figures 1 to 6
